Today in Pembrokeshire, surf is looking solid at 5 ft @ 8s WSW with a moderate 12 mph WNW wind. Good spots like Abereiddy and Whitesands Bay are working well, especially on the mid to late tides. Tomorrow, conditions improve with 4 ft @ 10s WSW and light 6 mph SSW winds, making for a fun day at all the usual spots. Day after, expect 9 ft @ 11s WSW but with fresh 27 mph SW winds, likely making it blown out. Best: tomorrow.
